attributes.action: Stop IS followers re entering UK
attributes.additional_details:
Those TRAITORS, the act never implemented because of the Capital Punishment it carries, MUST NEVER BE ALLOWED BACK ONTO UK SOIL.  Those in this country that are known to support, follow or implement such 'teachings' / way of life, expel from the UK.
Don't imprison them at a cost to the public, just have them remove & never allow back in the UK.
Dismiss the European Human Rights for such barbaric followers in this still just CHRISTIAN country.  CHRISTIANITY is being made a mock of by these religions  with their attempt to irradiate it for their own ends.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Stop ISIS organisations in the UK

Created by: John Loveday

Closing: 30/03/2015
